content:
The Mon and the 
 Cap 
 
 Noni 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Al of us went to the fun 
 
 fair. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Father bought brother 
 
 fancy glases. 
 
 
 
 Mother bought me a bright 
 
 blue cap. 
 
 
 
 The baby got sugar candy. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On the way home, a very 
 
 strong wind came. 
 
 
 
 It blew my cap away. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My cap got stuck on a 
 
 branch of a big old tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I cried a lot. 
 
 
 
 And I did not eat my diner. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Later that night, the mon 
 
 came up. It loked at my 
 
 cap in the big old tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The mon tried on my cap. 
 
 It smiled hapily. 
 
 
 
 I had to smile to. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 After schol the next day, 
 
 my mother gave me a shiny 
 
 new red cap. 
 
 
 
 "The mon sent it," she 
 
 said. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 That night, both the mon 
 
 and I wore our caps and 
 
 smiled. 
 
 
 
 We were hapy. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Do you think the sun neds 
 
 a hat? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Gues which cap I am 
 
 wearing today! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1
